name: Elixer Mixer
description: Elixer Mixer is a small game in which you trade potions in order to keep your garden alive and well, each potion has it's own stats, design and description. This application requires camera access in order to scan qr codes for the trading system.
developers: -【 ʎ ɟ ɟ n ʍ ~ o ɔ ᴉ u 】-
